Description:
All Investors Stop Here!
With a great tenant in place and a lease signed to May 2021 - add this one too your portfolio today. Large 3-bedroom, 2 bathroom & 2 living ready for your finishing touches. Step down to the sizeable lounge with a reverse cycle split system. Master bedroom has pocket bay views, walk in robe & full en-suite. Vast open plan kitchen & dining area is tiled with a ceiling fan & sliding out to undercover alfresco. Kitchen has stainless steel wall oven; 5 burner gas cook top & plenty of cupboards. Large 2nd living is light filled with views of the backyard, a gas heater & sliding door again to the pergola. Down the hall are bigger than average bedrooms that both have vertical blinds & built in robes. Central bathroom & toilet. Out the back is a storage/workshop, garden shed & plenty of yard for kids & pets to play. Tandem 2 car carport behind roller doors for secure parking. This awaits you on a great 604m2 block. Close to local schools, shopping centres, cafes, public transport, medical facilities & everything the Bellarine has to offer such as the bay, boat ramps, beaches, ferry services & wineries just to mention a few.
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Walk to the Water
This is the perfect opportunity to build your dream home with great views of the bay and beyond. Situated in an elevated position, the property is close to beaches, public transport, schools and the Portarlington - Melbourne ferry. This large block offers plenty of potential for familys keen to make use of this coastal location and could present a development opportunity (STCA) for investors keen to draw on the popularity of this region. Description:
Land for Sale : 7 BALBOA GROVE CURLEWIS VIC 3222
Phone enquiries - please quote property ID 21150
Dont miss out a fantastic opportunity to buy a titled residential block of land on the beautiful Bellarine Peninsula. The block is situated in the Bayview estate in Curlewis. It is a 400 sqm, level block. The Bayview estate has very few limitations in regards to designs and building timeframe. The block has fantastic views over Corio Bay as wellas over the creek and parklands with walking trails and bikepaths. This block is within walkingdistance form the local primaryschool, shoppingcenter and medical center as well as the beach and harbor of Clifton Springs. This block on 7 BALBOA GROVE CURLEWIS VIC 3222 is not designated bushfire prone Area you will save on that.
Area is 400m2
width 12.50m
Depth 32m
Thanks.

Description:
Lot 605 Jones Way, Seachange Estate
The latest extension to the beautiful Seachange Estate at St. Leonards - Stage 11B.
With lots ranging from 300sqm to over 490sqm and with frontages from 10m to 16m (and everything in between) there really is something to suit everyone's lifestyle and budget.
The quality of the previous stages is available for all to see with the landscaping themes to be continued into the next stages. Of particular note will be the palm tree lined dual carriage way entry boulevard as well as over 5 acres of wetland reserve available for passive recreation.
Less than 90 minutes from Melbourne and 30 minutes from Geelong 'Seachange' represents outstanding value for money and is no doubt why it is selling so quickly.
- Over 500 Lots sold in only 14 months
- Walk to the beach
- 1 hectare reserve with multi-aged playground, pavilion, soccer goal & half basketball court.
www.seachangeestate.com.au

Description:
Superb New Homes At Affordable Prices
These four new homes featuring three bedrooms & two bathrooms are beautifully finished with state of the art features. Situated less than 1.3km to the white sandy beaches of Port Phillip Bay and less than 1.9km to the boutique coffee strip of St Leonards, all recreational activities and amenities are at your fingertips. These delightful homes offer a peaceful and relaxing lifestyle that will make your seachange a perfect escape each weekend.
The open-plan kitchen/meals/family areas offer plenty of space to conduct your daily activities. The kitchens feature walk-in pantry, 900mm stainless-steel ovens and plenty of cupboard space. The homes are heated by ducted, gas-heating ensuring warmth on those chilly Winter nights.
The intelligent floorplans see the master bedrooms at the front of the homes away from the other two bedrooms. The masters feature walk-in-robes and ensuites, while the two remaining bedrooms offer built-in-robes. These two bedrooms are serviced by a centrally located bathroom and separate toilet.
Externally the homes feature a double lock-up garage with internal access. The homes are completed by landscaped front and rear gardens.

Description:
SEE THE POSSIBILITIES !
Choosing to relocate to the beautiful Bellarine will be a choice that you will never regret. Stunning northerly views of the undulating countryside and the glistening waters of Corio Bay.
Immaculately maintained and presented this three bedroom, two bathroom plus study home is located in a quiet street in the central area of Drysdale/Clifton Springs. Perfectly positioned amongst quality, modern homes - this is truly a lifestlye change !
Classy neutral palette, new floor coverings, solid timber floors, quality fixtures & fittings, intercom system, gas central heating, SSDW, walkin pantry, remote to garage and low maintenance gardens. Perfect !

Description:
Build Your Home in a Dream Location
Want to live across from lush parklands & be able to walk to the bay? Perfectly positioned this 350m2 block of land in the highly desired Bayview Estate Curlewis will tick your boxes. Here is your chance to build your modern dream home on the Bellarine Peninsula & live the lifestyle of envy including bays, beaches & wineries all at your doorstop. Just 17kms from Geelong CBD and within 12kms to Portarlington which features the Ferry Service across to Melbourne. Plus all the local schools, shops, cafes, supermarkets & medical facilities. The Bellarine rail trail is also here for all cycling & walking adventures with the Clifton Springs boat ramp just a short distance down the road. With generous government incentives, there has never been a better time to build than right now such as a bonus $25,000 for HomeBuilder scheme or $45,000 for first home buyers!* Conditions Apply

Description:
Large Allotment - Close to Town
Located less than 700m to the centre of the township of St Leonards this 534m2 (approx.) allotment is the perfect location to build your dream home. This corner allotment provides plenty of space for boat or caravan access and a two storey build will potentially take advantage of views of Port Phillip Bay and St Leonards' Salt Lagoon.
Enjoy the best that St Leonards has to offer by sipping a morning coffee at one of the many coffee shops or take a stroll along the picturesque Esplanade. It will be a lifestyle choice you will never regret.

Description:
Residential Haven on 852m2!
Looking for a larger block that gives multiple options for outdoor living ?
Here is an immaculately maintained 852m2 to play with. First impressions wow you with a series of garden rooms whether it's the flower garden, the vegetable garden, the parent's sitting area or the kid's play yard it's all here in one package. Room to build a shed with dual access on this corner block or just let the chooks roam around - blocks this size are as scarce as hen's teeth!
This mid 90s home consists of four bedrooms - main with WIR, ensuite and its own courtyard - three minor bedrooms all with BIRs. The 4th bedroom is currently used as a study.
Light and spacious main living includes a 3 metre screen and projector, solid fuel heater and wood stacker, doors that open to a garden deck surrounded by manicured gardens. The dining room has access to a north facing garden full of productive vegetable beds and fruit trees. Inside the hub of the home has granite benchtops, ceramic cooktop, SSDW and complete with Butlers pantry.
If you are up for entertaining the rumpus room is ready for those long awaited get-togethers. On those warm Spring days throw open the double doors to spill out onto the extended deck areas. This home and larger land component is not to be missed !

Description:
BLISSFUL LUXURY ABODE
This beautiful architecturally designed and unique custom home has been built with exquisite attention to detail and enjoys a relaxed luxurious ambiance that invites you to stop, take a breath and just take in the space and tranquility of this blissful position! Featuring a reversed living design with upstairs enjoying a designer kitchen with butlers pantry and spacious open plan dining & living space flowing out to an entertainers balcony with stunning bay views captured from not only the balcony but master and living. Upstairs further enjoys a beautiful master bedroom with full sized ensuite, second bedroom with BIR, full central bathroom and laundry whilst Downstairs features a formal lounge at the entrance of the home, 2 further bedrooms and third bathroom. Automobile enthusiasts will be impressed by the four car garage resembling a luxury car showroom featuring a reinforced slab provision for a hoist, spotless epoxy coated concrete flooring and glass doors leading through to a wet bar and out to the rear garden through bi fold glass doors.
Further features of the home include a Rinnai gas flame fireplace, ducted heating, split system and provisions installed for an internal lift should it be required in the future. Enjoy low maintenance living with fully landscaped gardens allowing more time to explore the beautiful Bellarine Peninsula with access to all wineries including Jack Rabbit, Laura Park Estate and much more. A short stroll gets you to both the waterfront reserve and Curlewis shopping centre - so park the car and relax - This magnificent home truly has something for everyone!

Description:
AS NEW NO. 64 SPARKLES, ROOM FOR BOAT/CARAVAN AND 5.4 KW SOLAR SYSTEM !
This well maintained home is just perfect and so easy to look after with everything finished to make the living easy, many extras. Two living areas with the second open plan space opening to a large undercover paved room , the flow from in to out provides fabulous entertaining , winter and summer. Study nook, three generous bedrooms, main with ensuite and WIR, remaining two have BIR'S, central bathroom , separate toilet and laundry.
Features include leadlight , new manufactured timber floors, central heating, three split systems, Bosch 900m oven, Meile dishwasher, walk in pantry, double glazed front windows, quality window furnishings, roll down blinds, fans (2 external) and loads of storage.
The matured landscaped garden has automated watering system , great vegie patch to delight the cook. Double garage with internal access, (both doors have remotes), second driveway for the boat and or caravan or extra vehicles, shed and good fencing. This prime position is a short walk to the jetty, the dell, all amenities , schools, shops and leisure walks. Enjoy a swim at the bay , just at the end of the street or just sit and fish. Bellarine living sure takes the stress out of living!

Description:
Hidden Palace
Behind the front fence sits this magnificent, charming home, filled to the brim with unique character. It will consume you with vibrancy and all its outstanding features.
This home has an abundance of space with two large living areas, three bedrooms with built in robes, a bright central bathroom with a double vanity, shower and a large bath to relax in.
The front lounge room is very roomy and has natural sunlight streaming in and it really showcases this pristine home.
A fully functional kitchen with island beach top, a 900mm gas cook top and oven with a premium designed range hood and very decorative wall tiles, transforms to contemporary splendour.
The hub of the home is the fantastic designed kitchen, dining and living room with its immaculate timber feature wall, timber-laminate flooring and decorative finishes.
An added bliss, with an additional room with comfort and style. An outdoor yet enclosed living room with exceptional finishes to entertain your guests or just chill out will be sure to impress. To cap this room off is a magnificent free standing chiminea, to enjoy the added warmth when required.
Additional space for storage or the gardening equipment is in abundance outside.
This home and its proximity to Drysdale and Clifton Springs, where shopping is plentiful with Aldi, Coles and Woolworths supermarkets and sporting clubs creates ease of living. Come and enjoy the peaceful ambience of living and playing on the Bellarine.
You are able to view this property 7 days a week by private inspection. We have created an environment to look and purchase safely. Please contact us to arrange a time to do so.

Description:
Titled Land in Exclusive Coastal Estate!
The Feel:
If building a brand new coastal residence with fantastic home business suitability and exposure has been on your wish list, then consider this already titled block in the exclusive Bayview Estate, and get moving on it now!
Design and build a modern dream home just moments from Curlewis best amenities, with the convenience of Clifton Springs Primary, Bayview Central shopping centre and the beach all right on your doorstep.
The Facts:
-Bonus $25,000 for HomeBuilder scheme or $45,000 for first home buyers!* Conditions Apply
-512sqm approx. land parcel in the beautifully planned Bayview Estate
-Rare titled land ready to build upon, at last years prices!
-16m street frontage and 32m block depth ideal for a large family home (STCA)
-Neighbouring allotment also available, ideal for expansive home/ shedding/ business
-Potential for elevated north facing living to enjoy views out to the bay (STCA)
-Surrounded by modern builds, childrens playgrounds and green spaces
-Well planned walkways lead through natural setting down to the beach
-Central Bellarine location for exploring local wineries and coastal towns
-Safe walk to Clifton Springs Primary School via Griggs Creek Bridge
-Easy access to Bayview Central for shopping, cafes and health services
-Bus services nearby for local colleges and access into Geelong CBD

Description:
Double your returns
Stunning opportunity for investors looking for dual income stream. With a highly respected local business as anchor tenant of the commercial section of the two storey building this is a sound offering.
The second level residence is currently used for short term stays but would easily convert to a permanent rental for an outstanding return.
The ground floor commercial space has full street frontage, kitchenette & toilet facilities. Inspection of the commercial shop is strictly by appointment as it is a very busy hairdressing salon.
The upstairs residence is well designed to take advantage of the view towards the bay & the You Yangs with dual sliding door access onto the alfresco deck with quality shade blind.
The mains gas stainless steel fireplace is a dramatic feature of the living room & cleverly doubles as the entertainment wall.
The modern kitchen with island bench, entertaining servery, 900mm stainless oven & gas cooktop, plenty of draws & overhead cupboards.
Master bedroom with walk around robe & direct bathroom access.
Bedrooms two & three a fully carpeted with built in robes.
Industrial style stainless tap & ceramic bathroom fittings give it that inner city warehouse chic feeling. A large bath & an oversize double shower complete the package.
The high vaulted ceilings with skylights let in plenty of light.
Striking timber floors are stunning feature throughout.
Entry via remote through the four car garage to the residence from the rear laneway.
There is a downstairs laundry & Shower with access via the spiral staircase to the second level.
Please enquire for further details on income returns & section 32.

Description:
CHARACTER CHARM
There is a uniqueness and charm that characterizes 4 Thamballina Road Clifton Springs. The features of this beautiful home include a Dutch hip roof line, solid timber features and cathedral ceilings. Built in the mid 90s by the current vendors. The home was extended in 2008 expanding on the living, kitchen and bedroom space. All included there are five bedrooms, four living areas and two bathrooms.
Parents can enjoy their own space with the main bedroom, ensuite, WIR and private retreat all located upstairs. The minor downstairs bedrooms are serviced by a quality renovated bathroom.
As you enter the living area stunning timber beams compliment the cathedral ceilings, stained glass window and feature solid fuel heater. The open plan living, dining, kitchen areas incorporate access to the serene, outdoor deck with established shrubbery. A renovated kitchen has granite bench tops, quality appliances & cabinetry.
The extension incorporates a two further bedrooms with WIRs, second living area with gas log fire for those cool nights and kitchen facilitites. Up the spiral staircase there is a quiet space with its own balcony which has a water views of Corio Bay. Complete with attic storage.
Manicured gardens make outdoor time a pleasure. Addition of two water tanks provides for the vegetable garden beds.
The double garage with remote provides plenty of room for parking.
